So did they just rename it Robots in Disguise, say it was on Earth and 
send it over here?

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> OOC: No, no, no.  Beast Wars 2 was one of many Japanese series that 
never 
> came over here.  Ya see, after the Japanese had shown the first 
season of 
> Beast Wars, they hadn't yet gotten episodes from season two and 
three, so 
> they showed 2 filler series while they were waiting.  In 1998, the 
Beast Wars 
> 2 cartoon came out in Japan with a new set of Cybertrons and 
Destrons facing 
> off on the planet Gaea for something called Angolmois energy.  The 
Cybertron 
> leader was Lioconvoy, a lion, and the leader of the Destrons was a 
new 
> Galvatron, who was a dragon.  All the other toys were repaints of 
Beast Wars, 
> Generatrion 2, and even Generation 1 toys.  There was kind of a 
"nature 
> versus technology" theme in the show quite similar to what Beast 
Machines 
> would later do, with the "good guys" being animals and the "bad 
guys" being 
> vehicles.  In case you were wondering, the next year they did Beast 
Wars NEO.
